ModMetaData.name: Rim73
ModMetaData.author: Ghost_Rolly
ModMetaData.description:
Improves the games performance by recoding some parts of the game. Load last.
o Hediff optimisations : aggregates the ticking from (ABC, ABC, ABC) to (AAA, BBB, CCC) to improve performance take advantage of memory location. o Pather optimisations : when in combat, will temporarly disable pawns when enemies are trying to path but blocked by another pawn. o Jobs optimisations : same paradigm as Hediff optimisations, reduces the amount of unecessary tickings and job looking.
